text: As on June 30, 2025, TCS applied for 8,987 patents and has been granted 4,939 patents. In the quarter alone, 171 patents were applied of which 119 were granted. #TCSQ1

profile_bio.description: Harnessing cutting-edge technology and innovation for sustainable, purpose-driven transformations globally.

text: The growth for the quarter was led by AI & Data, TCS Interactive and Cybersecurity. Win themes across key deals involved operating model transformation, vendor consolidation, #AI powered intelligent automation, and SAP S4/HANA based transformation deals. #TCSQ1

profile_bio.description: Harnessing cutting-edge technology and innovation for sustainable, purpose-driven transformations globally.

Q1 FY26 Revenue at $ 7,421 million; down 1.1 % Y-o-Y
Q1 FY26 Net Profit Rs.12,760 crore

text: We are excited to share that TCS MasterCraft™ is now GenAI and Agentic AI-powered—designed to help enterprises modernize legacy systems faster and smarter, cutting costs by over 70% and delivering results twice as fast as traditional approaches.
